item.title: On characterizations of some bivariate continuous distributions by properties of higher-degree bivariate stop-loss transforms
Dependence Modelling
item.description: One principal aim of statistical modeling is to analyze the dependence structure that exists in a multivariate dataset. The data that are collected nowadays are highly complex to analyze the dependence structures, and it requires the construction of new models and statistical measures, which is a challenging task.

item.title: On conditional lower partial moments and its applications
Some properties of conditional partial moments in the context of stochastic modelling
